title: Amazing Stories Volume 04 Number 04
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940

description: Amazing Stories, volume 4, number 4 (July 1929). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publishing Co. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Pd. D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Back cover missing. Featuring: The Book of Worlds (Miles J. Breuer), The Superperfect Bride (Bob Olsen), The Flying Fool (David H. Keller), Futility (S. P. Meek), The Space Hermit (Edsel Newton), The Desert of Ice (Jules Verne; 2/2), Danger (Fletcher Pratt & Irvin Lester), and The Purple Death (Jack Barnette).
